name: Halloween Makeups
description:
Dear girls, every year do you expect the date “ October 31”? Are you crazy about Costume Parties, haunted house, trick-or-treat, or some other celebrating ways? If your answer is Yes, and you have such a deep feeling about these celebrations on that day, you’ll absolutely cheer for prophetic games new app ----- Halloween Makeup, this is our big surprise for you to welcome the upcoming festival!
This day is usually celebrated among family, friends, even co-workers in many different ways, but the most popular tradition is holding a large costume party at October 31’s night! So, when the “Costume Party” comes into your mind, what will you think about? All sorts of strange clothes, unique make-up, colorful masks, dress up as spooks, ghosts, walking skeletons which exist in the spiritual and physical world, or dress up as witches and wizards in a party where has been filled with bats, black cats and spiders.
Since the parties are so attractive and have such a magic power, do you want to attend a creative costume party and enjoy an unusual experience? If you really do, you can not miss our Prophetic games special launch for this coming Halloween!!! Now, no need to hesitate, just join our Halloween Makeup !
How To Play:
Start with a soothing spa to make sure the girl’s hair and skin are flawless already to show up in the costume party. Next, help her choose a hair style, eye color and put the makeup on, after thatThen, assist her to select a unique suit of clothes, stocking, shoes, and the matched accessories (including necklace, earrings, bracelet and headgear). At last, you can also choose a special prop in her hand. After all these process, she will appear in the biggest costume party, let's follow her and see how amazing it is!
Features:
· Spa Section
· Makeup Section
· Dress up Section
· Many hair styles and hair colors to choose
· Try on dozens of different eye colors, eye-shadows, mascaras, lipsticks, and more · A lot of special clothes and dresses to choose
· A huge variety of decoration items, including earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and headgears to choose
· Several stockings to choose
· Plentiful shoes of different styles to choose
· Many interesting props to choose, such as magic wands and so on
· 3 dynamic and vivid backgrounds
· Take a photo with the girl together
· Share the unique girl via Facebook or E-mail with just one click
· Screenshots of the girl can be saved in your photo album
· Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions
Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play, All the items are also totally free to use.
